data.name: EdgeLords
data.detailed_description:
• 200+ playable cards
  • 50+ summonable glyphs, allies and minions
  • 4 playable characters, each with 4 erotic outfits that change their deck archtype
  • 12 unlockable fully animated, multi-stage, interactive hentai loops
  • Multiple languages will be supported
  • Custom full illustration by DankoDeadZone
  • Full voice acting



Death. Doom. Destruction. All will fall before her Dark Legion as she instigates the apocalypse and ends the world.
Deathgrip is a gothic duluhan and her signature attack Reaper's Blade, which gains a Soul Gem card each time its played.


Under the hidden grove, deep within the tree of life lies the fountain where Melonie, the love fairy can be found.
Her volumptious body is irresistable, giving her opponent's decks Temptation cards that are often too good to turn down.
VA: MissMoonified


The most powerful warlock in the realm. Ashka is an arrogant, smug brat.
Her spells are devastating, especially Concussive Blast - each time its played, its damage increases!
VA: Wubcake


Emerging from the flaming portal in the forbidden woods, Lilith is an assassin sent from the demon realm to claim the title of Lord.
What she lacks in magic, she makes up for in action economy. Brace yourself for Hedonic Rush, which usually precedes another attack straight away.
VA: Gina Galore


  • EdgeLords is a Lords-type strategy card game, where two bosses fling spells at one another and summon minions to support them.
  • Each turn you draw 5 cards and are provided 1 action point.
  • Many cards can be played at no cost. Some cost mana or action points.
  • Play your cards tactically to deal damage, heal, summon allys and draw cards to keep on top of your opponent.
  • Every time you play a card, you gain climax, once your climax meter fills, you can unleash a devastating ability!
  • Once you defeat your opponent, enjoy a multi-stage looping animation as you harvest their 'essence'.

data.short_description: Teetering on the brink of existance lies the realm called the 'Edge'. Inhabited by only the hardiest of sorceresses. But there's only room for one Edge Lord! Confront your rivals and claim their magical 'essence' for your own in this fully-animated and voiced hentai card game!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 64 bit
  • Processor: 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 750
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains depictions of graphic sex. Occasionally with monsters, almost always non consensually.
Including:

○ Full female nudity and fetish costumes
○ Futanari and female sex, often nonconsensual 
○ Various explicit sex acts
○ Fantasy sexual situations
○ Monster sex and exotic penis types
○ Fantasy violence and foul language
